title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
description: When using the value new Date("3/2/2005") in a table filter, an error message is thrown. This error occurs when saving and previewing the report.
OB: When using the filter with the value new Date("3/2/2005") in the table, an error message is displayed on the report page: There are error(s) in Table: table8. Error0: data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s)). The error detail states that there was an error in data type conversion and that the given value cannot be converted to a Date.
EB: Save and preview the report. The expected result is that the table filter should work without any errors.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 

1. Create a new datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column. 
2. Insert a table into the report. 
3. Add a filter based on the datetime column. 
4. In the value1 input field of the filter, enter the following value: new Date("..."). For example, new Date("3/2/2005").
